page.title: 12MAPPERLEY
page.content: {MAPPERLEY Mapperley is a small quiet village which is picturesque and is typical of the English countryside.It includes a primary school, a post office and a general store, public house and church on the edge of a country park with a good bus service. {PRIMARY SCHOOL Mapperley School is the smallest school we had ever seen.This school has only 32 children in it and had only 2 classrooms, a cloakroom,hallway and a small staffroom.The headteacher's name is Mr Treseder,and there is only one more teacher.This teacher only works there on Tuesdays and Fridays,and on the other days Mr Treseder takes all 32 children.There is one big playground that goes all the way round the back.The classrooms are full of pictures.
